answer:
Yes, the emotion of Melissa Decker changes from scenario 2 to scenario 3. In scenario 2, Melissa feels slightly optimistic and appreciated when Jerry invites her to join the group project and she thanks him for thinking of her. However, in scenario 3, she starts to feel frustrated and conflicted when she tells Jerry she needs to focus on her own goals and is unsure if she can continue with the project.

Option: c. Yes, from This makes her feel slightly optimistic and appreciated. to She starts to feel frustrated and conflicted.
